org.springframework.web.service.invoker.HttpRequestValues

Packages that use HttpRequestValues
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.support
Classes supporting the org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client package.
org.springframework.web.service.invoker
Support for creating a client proxy for an HTTP service annotated with HttpExchange methods.

    Perform the given request, release the response content, and return the response headers.
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void>
